thread.title: Strike threat after Tube worker sacked 'for tackling fare dodger who punched pregnant woman in stomach'
thread.title_full: Strike threat after Tube worker sacked 'for tackling fare dodger who punched pregnant woman in stomach'

author: dick Murray
title: Strike threat after Tube worker sacked 'for tackling fare dodger who punched pregnant woman in stomach'
text:
1/17 Chaos as commuters battle to get to work during the Tube strike

The queue at Hackney Central station as commuters brave the Tube strike @CaramelBear81/Twitter 16/17 Chaos as commuters battle to get to work during the Tube strike

Commuters queue for taxis at Paddington station @sharon_timms1 
They said it sent a message “to fare dodgers and yobbos that staff can be treated as punchbags.” 
It will now ballot for strike action all its staff at London Bridge – one of the busiest stations in London – and is looking to escalate the dispute. 
The Evening Standard revealed the sacking last month. The staff member appealed but the dismissal was today upheld by a top-level London Underground (LU) inquiry.
